items.fullCompanyName: 太兴饮食管理（中国）有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
岗位职责：
一、HR系统日常运维
1、负责根据业务所需进行各类系统设置，如组织设置、表单设置、审批流设置、绩效设置、报表设置等；
2、负责接收用户上报问题，处理各类系统故障报错，如电子合同故障、考勤打卡故障、员工信息同步故障等；
3、负责提供各类用户操作指导与培训；
4、负责用户及角色权限管理、企业微信集成管理、后台数据管理等。
二、HR系统持续优化
1、参与HR业务梳理、流程优化、标准作业程序制定等；
2、负责业务调研、需求收集、需求分析、解决方案设计等；
3、负责对接HR系统厂商，管理与推动相关功能的开发与交付。
三、完成上级分配的其他工作

岗位要求：
1、全日制本科或以上学历，人力资源、信息管理、计算机等专业优先；
2、三年以上主流HR系统运维或实施经验，红海EHR系统经验优先，企业微信集成经验优先，SAP集成经验优先；
3、熟悉HR专业知识与相关业务，结合业务与IT视角，保证HR系统功能贴合业务真实所需；
4、具备良好的沟通、表达、及协调能力，为人友善，阳光乐观。

sesameLabelList.labelDefinition: 企业在全国拥有多家连锁直营店铺。
据工商登记信息显示，该企业相比其他同行业更早进入市场。
该企业绝对控股7公司，绝对控股是指出资额占有限责任公司资本总额百分之六十七以上或者其持有的股份占股份有限公司股本总额百分之六十七以上。

items.industryType1Str: 电子技术/半导体/集成电路
items.industryType2Str: 电子技术/半导体/集成电路
items.fullCompanyName: 广州众山精密科技有限公司
items.companyIndustryType1Str: 电子技术/半导体/集成电路
items.companyIndustryType2Str: 电子技术/半导体/集成电路
items.jobDescribe:
岗位职责：
1、推动人力资源信息化系统上线工作，统筹并梳理各模块系统上线需求，进行合理化规划；
2、负责人力资源信息化系统搭建工作，对接技术供应商，跟进系统上线的具体实施工作；
3、统筹人力资源信息化系统的落地应用，管理各项人力资源数据，确保各业务部门获得及时且准确的人力资源数据；
4、定期梳理人力资源数据，持续对数据状况进行审视，不断优化系统数据质量，根据不同应用场景输出人力资源数据分析报告和相关报表；
5、协助HR各模块线上流程标准化建设，评估业务需求，提供合理化及可行性建议。
任职要求：
1、学历：本科及以上学历，人力资源管理、信息系统管理等相关专业优先；
2、经验：3年以上工作经验，对人力资源信息化工作有一定了解，具有人力资源信息化系统实操经验优先；
3、核心胜任力：对数据敏感，具备良好的逻辑思维；熟悉数据处理及数据分析工具；良好的沟通协调能力、抗压能力；具备持续学习精神。

sesameLabelList.labelDefinition: 发布时间:2023-12-28,评定有效期:3年,颁发机构:全国高新技术企业认定管理工作领导小组办公室。符合《高新技术企业认定管理办法》规定，符合国家重点支持的高新技术领域，持续进行研究开发与技术成果转化，形成企业核心自主知识产权，并以此为基础开展经营活动，在中国境内（不包括港、澳、台地区）注册成立一年以上的居民企业。
评定有效期:3年。企业符合《优质中小企业梯度培育管理暂行办法》中专精特新企业的认定条件，具有“专业化、精细化、特色化、 新颖化”特征，从事特定细分市场时间达到 2 年以上，企业规模必须符合国家《中小企业划型标准》的规定。

sesameLabelList.labelName: 省级工程技术研究中心
sesameLabelList.labelDefinition: 发布时间:2023-02-17,颁发机构:广东省科学技术厅。符合《工程技术研究中心管理办法》的要求，企业、科研院所、高校或其他具有科技创新能力的机构建设的科研实体，拥有高水平的工程技术研发队伍，具有较完备的工程化综合配套条件，较强的技术创新能力、成果转化能力和行业服务能力，并与国内相关企业联系紧密，对本行业发展有引领作用。

items.industryType1Str: 专业服务(咨询、人力资源、财会)
items.fullCompanyName: 上海外服（集团）有限公司
items.companyIndustryType1Str: 专业服务(咨询、人力资源、财会)
items.jobDescribe:
主要岗位职责
1、	负责公司人力资源SAP HR、DHR等系统的运营问题处理、系统运维支持、权限管理优化、持续优化协同等；
2、	协同推进公司人力资源信息化需求管理、跟进需求落地进展，负责组织核心人力系统UAT验收等；
3、	协同负责公司核心人力关键业务运营质扫描报告落地，定期更新等。
4、	完成上级领导交办的临时性工作。
要求
全日制本科及以上学历
人力资源管理、计算机软件、信息管理或相关专业毕业
SAP PA证书（或有）
熟练掌握SAP HR OM/PA/PT/PY 等子模块业务操作、系统解决方案、实施运维配置等
熟悉SAP HR与外围系统的对接方案
了解HR类业务流程设计方案
熟练使用OFFICE等办公工具
2年以上SAP HR项目实施经验
SAP完整周期2个以上项目实施经验
有ERP咨询公司/ERP运维公司/甲方公司运维经验者优先考虑

sesameLabelList.labelDefinition: 该企业为实际控制人为国务院、各地区国有资产监督管理委员会、地方人民政府或机关单位。
经芝麻通过公开数据识别，企业为外服控股子公司。
经芝麻通过公开数据识别，该企业过去1年曾中标国企单位的招标项目。属于工银安盛人寿保险有限公司、华侨城物业（集团）有限公司天津分公司、融通人力资源开发有限公司、北京华侨城物业服务有限公司供应商，其具有较高的资金实力和经营能力。

items.companyName: 北京市七环工程技术咨询
items.fullCompanyName: 北京市七环工程技术咨询有限责任公司
items.jobDescribe:
1.部门内全面工作。
（1）制定部门年度工作计划和阶段工作计划。
（2）根据工作计划，负责组织实施。
（3）负责员工的培训、指导、考核和监督管理，参与员工的招聘筛选工作。
（4）负责协调本部门与其他部门间关系。
2.制定公司用工制度、日常人事管理制度、薪资制度、人事档案管理制度、绩效管理制度、培训体系等规章制度、实施细则和人力资源工作流程，组织实施，监督、协调、检查执行情况。
3.根据公司的整体发展战略规划，组织拟订机构设置、岗位职责设计和定员定编方案，对公司组织架构设计和人员调配提出合理改进方案。
4.统筹招聘工作，甄选合适的人员。
5.组织公司薪酬福利管理工作，编写公司年度薪酬福利计划及方案的编制，实施月度薪酬福利发放统计表。
6.组织公司员工的绩效管理工作，审定绩效考核结果。
7.制定公司员工的培训计划，监督根据公司发展需要安排的培训课程。
8.劳动合同的签订，组织受理劳动争议和员工投诉，并联合相关部门妥善解决。监督各类人事事务工作的开展，考勤、各类人事档案的归档保管、录用退工、入职离职手续办理等事宜。
9 商标局官方网报相关工作。
10.完成上级交办的其他相关工作。
11、负责人事档案和劳动合同管理工作，公司人事文件的呈转及发放；
12、负责新进员工试用期的跟踪考核，晋升提薪及转正合同的签订并形成相应档案资料；
13、负责考勤审核，处理考勤异常情况；

sesameLabelList.labelDefinition: 经芝麻通过公开数据识别，该企业过去1年曾中标国企单位的招标项目。属于中煤东方生态建设集团有限公司、北京云电电气有限责任公司、中交一公局集团有限公司、中航天建设工程集团有限公司、国网冀北招标有限公司等供应商，其具有较高的资金实力和经营能力。
经芝麻通过公开数据识别，经芝麻通过公开数据识别，企业过去1年曾中标政府机构的招标项目。属于政府机构的供应商，其具有较高的资金实力和经营能力。
评定年份:2022。税务部门采用年度评价指标得分和直接判级相结合的方式，依据纳税人信用历史信息、税务内部信息和外部信息等内容对纳税人进行信用评价，按照信用程度设为A、B、C、D四级，A级纳税人是税务部门评定的纳税信用级别最高的纳税人。

items.fullCompanyName: 阿斯利康投资（中国）有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
Typical Accountabilities
·Works within a team to deliver day-to-day HR services to customers through multiple channels, including HR hotline, email etc..
·Manages own tasks and operates independently to interpret, diagnose and resolve identified problems, escalating only complex issues for resolution
·Assists line managers to understand, interpret and apply HR policies, including providing the ground support in the execution of HR delivery in own specialist area
·Works within defined guidelines and policies, applying judgement to their application, this role will also identify issues with current processes and provide input on proposed changes to enhance effectiveness of HR delivery
·Works with management to understand business priorities and tailor HR support to local requirements
·Under direction, provides HR support to assist with the communication of change
·Regular reporting of customer and advisor service level activity
·Support local and global HR projects delivery in local.
Other tasks assigned by manager.
Essential
·Bachelor degree with 2-3 years HR generalist experience
·Strong interpersonal & communication skills;
·Good written and verbal English skills;
·High sense of responsibility and accountability and confidentiality;
·Have good command of MS office.
Desirable
·Studying for a professional qualification
·Fluent English in oral and business writing;
·Working experience in multinational company and HR Shared Services Area
·Well understand local labor law

sesameLabelList.labelDefinition: 该企业由外国的自然人、企业或者其他组织投资，依照中国法律在中国境内经登记注册设立。
发布时间:2022-01-23,颁发机构:Top Employers Institute,评定年份:2022。由Top Employers Institute认证，通过《人力资源最佳实践调研问卷》来评估参与企业，问卷涉及人力资源六大领域及20个话题，包括人才策略、工作环境、人才招聘、学习、福祉、多元化与包容性等，最终评选出中国杰出雇主。
颁发机构:南方周末,评定年份:2023。由和众泽益与南方周末公益研究中心联合发布，依据南方周末公益研究中心建立的公益品牌全链条评价模型，从公益品牌基础、公益品牌实施、公益品牌改进三个维度，评选出中国企业志愿服务品牌。

items.industryType1Str: 电子技术/半导体/集成电路
items.fullCompanyName: 福禄克测试仪器（上海）有限公司
items.companyIndustryType1Str: 电子技术/半导体/集成电路
items.jobDescribe:
DESCRIPTION: 
 The Talent Specialist role is a key position that will be focused on 
supporting and administering processes within the Talent Domain across the APAC 
region. This will include support for Talent Acquisition, Talent Management and 
Learning processes. The main objective will be to ensure efficient coordination 
and documentation of hiring activities, maintain accurate records, assist with 
Talent Management, and learning and development initiatives. This role will 
have a heavy focus on driving continuous improvement and process efficiency 
across the Talent landscape.

 RESPONSIBILITIES: 
 ? Coordinate and schedule interviews, ensuring all logistics are in place, 
including interviewers' availability, meeting rooms, and necessary equipment.
 ? Serve as a point of contact for internal stakeholders regarding interview 
scheduling and provide timely updates on interview status.
 ? Coordinate pre-employment activities, such as reference checks, background 
screenings, and employment verifications, ensuring timely completion and 
documentation.
 ? Maintain accurate and organized talent acquisition records, including 
candidate profiles, interview notes, and hiring documentation in compliance 
with company policies and legal requirements.
 ? Assist with the onboarding process for new hires, including offer packages, 
coordinating paperwork, and ensuring completion of required documents.
 ? Support learning and development administration and relevant logistics, 
including scheduling training sessions, tracking attendance, and managing 
training materials, post training survey and follow up.
 ? Support Learning Management System (LMS) content development/maintenance 
and learning activity logistics, including but limited to loading content into 
the LMS, testing / escalating bugs, sending out pre-work / surveys and 
configuring reports as needed for the sites.
 ? Assist with the coordination and administration of employee development 
programs, such as mentoring initiatives and leadership development activities.
 ? Collaborate with the HR team to ensure timely and accurate reporting of 
talent acquisition and learning and development metrics.
 ? Provide support to overall performance check in process, including 
initiating communication to employees and managers about check-in timelines & 
materials, and providing reporting updates post completion.
 ? Identify opportunities for process optimization and collaborate with key 
stakeholders to implement improvements, optimize workflows, and enhance the 
overall effectiveness across the talent landscape.
 ? Stay up to date with industry trends and best practices in talent 
acquisition, learning, and development administration, suggesting improvements 
to enhance our processes and practices.

 QUALIFICATIONS/YOU WILL BE SUCCESSFUL IF YOU HAVE: 
 ? Attention to detail: Demonstrated ability to maintain accurate records, 
follow processes meticulously, and ensure data integrity.
 ? Organizational skills: Strong ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple 
projects simultaneously, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
 ? Problem-solving mindset: Proven track record of identifying issues, 
analyzing root causes, and implementing effective solutions to improve 
processes and efficiency.
 ? Continuous improvement mindset: Eagerness to seek out opportunities for 
improvement, embrace change, and proactively suggest enhancements to talent 
acquisition and learning and development administration.
 ? Collaboration and teamwork: Ability to work effectively with 
cross-functional teams, HR stakeholders, and external partners to achieve 
common goals and drive success.
 ? Communication skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, 
with the ability to effectively communicate with internal stakeholders and 
candidates.
 ? Analytical skills: Proficiency in analyzing data and metrics to identify 
trends, patterns, and areas for improvement in talent acquisition and learning 
and development administration.
 ? Adaptability: Willingness to adapt to changing priorities, learn new 
technologies and systems, and thrive in a dynamic work environment.
 ? Tech-savviness: Comfort and proficiency in using various HR software, 
applicant tracking systems (ATS), and case management tools.
 ? Confidentiality: Ability to handle sensitive and confidential information 
with discretion and maintain a high level of professionalism.
 ? Proactive approach: Self-motivated and driven to take initiative, 
anticipate needs, and exceed expectations in talent acquisition and learning 
and development administration.
 ? Customer service orientation: Commitment to providing exceptional service 
to candidates, internal stakeholders, and employees throughout the talent 
acquisition and learning and development processes.

 PREFERRED REQUIREMENTS:
 ? Bachelor's degree in human resources, business administration, or a related 
field.
 ? 3-5 years’ experience in HR operations role, preferably in talent 
acquisition.
 ? Proficiency in using applicant tracking systems (ATS) and other HR software.
 ? Must be proficient in English, preferred language capabilities: Chinese, 
Japanese, Korean, or Hindi.

sesameLabelList.labelDefinition: 该企业为全部或部分由香港特别行政区、澳门特别行政区、台湾地区投资者投资，依照中国法律在中国境内经登记注册设立。

items.fullCompanyName: ABB（中国）有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
General Description:
 We are seeking HR Service Specialist
 with relevant HR experience and background for our HR Services ,HR team in 
Beijing China.
 As a HR Service
 Specialist, you will be responsible for execute accurate service processes
 related to Employee Life Cycle, following employee changes in company from
 onboarding to separation, ensure appropriate support for internal customers,
 and oversee accurate and timely processing of information with all
 stakeholders.
 Tasks
 · 
 Handle
 employee life cycle activities like onboarding, separation, transfer, contract
 renewal, long service award,etc
 · 
 Manage employee’s personal file
 Employee certificate 
 Responsible for
 government activities (working hour application, workforce registration
 and reporting)
 Manage HR Service products 
 ·

 vendor/agency

 working experience in foreign company is an advantage

items.companyName: Bureau Veritas 必维申美商品检测（上海）
items.fullCompanyName: Bureau Veritas 必维申美商品检测（上海）有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
Duties & Responsibilities: 
-	Liaise with business leaders/managers to develop and implement local compensation & benefits(C&B) strategies that are appropriate for the business needs, and consistent with the company’s overall reward strategy.
-	Define and develop the C&B programs and activities to meet the company short-term or long-term objectives with regards to internal equity and external market competitiveness
-	Lead/manage routine C&B related processes/operation, e.g. budgeting, salary planning, merit increase, incentive scheme, etc.
-	Assist SBU/HRBP to establish performance review and evaluation system of the company, organize the execution of the system on a yearly basis.
-	Stay informative of industrial trends through market events or C&B survey activities. Analyze and evaluate external market data as well as internal data about the company’s current employee population and future needs to develop salary budgets and forecasts.
-	Bridging with global C&B team, leading the job evaluation, job grading, pay equity, etc.
-	Build/maintain people dashboard to support business decisions on a regular basis.
-	Coach or train China HRBP team with the C&B methodology or practices.
-	Other tasks assigned for need.

Job Requirements: 
-	Bachelor degree holder or above in HR management, Finance, Data Analysis or other related disciplines
-	8-10 years’ working experience in C&B function, MNC or C&B project management experience are preferable;
-	Good logical thinking, sense of data, solid C&B knowledge and good understanding of local laws;
-	Good communication and outstanding problem-solving ability;
-	Able to tactfully deal with difficult and sensitive situations
-	Fluent in written and oral English;
-	Familiar with MS Word, Excel and PPT;
-	Having consulting related working experience is a plus.

items.fullCompanyName: 恩福(上海)检测技术有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
We are looking for an HR Operations Specialist II to join our HR team in China. In this role, you will act as the China subject matter expert for HR operational activities and partner closely with the HR Business Partner (HRBP) community, providing support and actioning transactional HR activities via our ServiceNow HRSD platform. 

What you will be doing:
As HR Operations Specialist II, China, your responsibilities may include but are not limited to:
- Using HR’s portal and case management system (ServiceNow HRSD), responsible for queue management, end-to-end handling of cases and driving case closure across the platform amongst the broader HR Community
- Provide effective and prompt solutions to internal customer inquiries on a wide array of HR topics, and deliver an excellent customer experience
- Maintain in-depth knowledge of company-specific HR policies and practices
- Complete Oracle HCM data entry requests. Audit data and processes to ensure accuracy and administer accompanying reporting
- Support with pre-onboarding, lifecycle, and off boarding processes, ensuring required information is collected and maintained
- Create, maintain, and keep all employee records/files up to date, utilizing HR systems
- Perform technical and administrative HR Solutions duties such as employment verification and travel letters, filing government reports etc. 
- Identify and support continuous improvement opportunities and implementation of continuous improvement projects and initiatives in processes and systems

The candidate we are looking for:
- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related discipline or equivalent relevant experience
- One year minimum of relevant HR Operations/HS Shared Service Center experience
- Strong technical skills and experience with MS Office and using an HRIS systems, previous experience with ServiceNow HRSD and Oracle HCM is an asset 
- Solid customer service, communication, and interpersonal skills
- Proven attention to detail while effectively managing multiple demands and competing priorities
- Self-directed, excellent time management skills and ability to maintain flexibility under tight and fluctuating deadlines
- Flexibility to occasionally work outside of regular hours to support global operations (if necessary due to different time zones)
- High proficiency in the English language.

职位描述：
1 参与/组织HRIS项目的业务调研，需求分析，方案设计，功能测试，数据整理等工作；			
2 组织HRIS用户测试，培训、推广，确保系统项目顺利实施；

4 为HRIS使用者提供业务和技术支持，收集用户反馈，持续迭代系统功能；			
5 人力资源数据分析，满足标准和定制化数据需求；			
6 HRIS运维和集中操作；			
7 上级安排的其他任务。			

职位要求：
教育程度：本科或以上学历，管理类/信息技术类相关专业		
工作经验：3年以上相关工作经验；有人力资源事务/HRIS项目经验/HR数据分析相关的工作经验优先	
外语能力：英语六级		
计算机技能：熟练使用Excel，PPT等办公软件

items.fullCompanyName: 深圳市英维克科技股份有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
岗位职责：
1、为海外项目发展提供全面人力资源解决方案。
2、支持总部HR政策在海外项目落地执行。
3、为海外项目的发展提供人力资源支持，建立国内、外劳动用工规则，风险管制等。
4、协助上级推动人力资源系统各业务需求调研、开发进度、系统培训、测试及系统优化工作。
5、完成上级临时交待的工作任务。
任职要求：
1、有海外人力资源从业经验，了解欧美、中东国家法律法规。
2、具备人力资源各模块理论知识，擅长其中1、2个模块。
3、有一定的数据分析能力，对数据敏感。
4、本科或以上学历，人力资源或英语专业，有3年以上人力资源相关工作经验，英语可作为日常工作语言。

items.companyName: 深圳美年大健康健康管理
items.fullCompanyName: 深圳美年大健康健康管理有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
一、岗位职责：
1、负责员工入职、调动、离职手续办理； 
2、负责人力资源系统基础信息录入、清理与核对；
3、负责员工档案管理与盘点； 
4、配合部门开展招聘、培训、企业文化宣传、员工活动；
5、参与人力资源制度建设与实施；
6、参与人力资源数据统计、分析；
7、部门交办的其他工作。
二、任职要求：
1.本科及以上学历，人力资源、行政管理、法学、新闻学、数学、统计学等相关专业；
2.具备在发展成熟或管理机制健全企业从事人力资源管理一年及以上经验，高新技术企业、科技制造业、大型服务业、传统金融业优先；
3.掌握基本的人力资源相关技能及理论知识并熟练运用excel等办公软件，
4.具备良好的沟通表达能力，信息、知识收集整合能力，报告制作及展示技巧，对数据有一定的敏感性和分析判断能力；
5.踏实稳重，责任心强，抗压能力强，具备团队协作精神

三 、员工福利：
1.按国家法定规定享有年假、法定节假日；
2.按国家法定规定入职一个月内即购买社保及公积金；
3.员工及亲属享受公司年度体检；
4.享有年度评优、晋职、晋级及调薪；
5.长跑、羽毛球、登山等多样化的体育活动；
6.重阳节、女神节等专业及特色的节日活动；
7.端午、中秋、元旦等传统节日礼品；
8.部门定期团建活动；
9.享受新产品、新业务增量奖励机制。

items.fullCompanyName: 恩骅力工程材料（江苏）有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
Role and Responsibility
? Conduct blueprint workshops to obtain the internal requirements.
? Work with stakeholders to ensure proper understanding and gathering of all existing data, information and processes.
? Provide analysis and solution to enhance practices or match process with new HRIS’ operation standards in terms of system, dispatching, social benefits, and core payroll services.
? Design and document the solution including business requirements, HR out-sourcing process and any program specifications required according to New HRIS' documentation guidelines
? Liaise with stakeholders throughout the data cleansing, mapping and conversion phase and provide any assistance required including performing data loads and reconciliation
? Provide end user training including creating training material and training systems.
? Generate test scripts to enable clients to adequately test the solution
? Support stakeholders throughout the UAT, Parallel and Go-Live phases.
? Escalate project issues to Implementation Manager including scope variations, task slippages and any risks that may arise during the project.
? Liaise with internal teams to ensure that internal requirements are understood and timeframes are adhered to 
Key Requirements:
? University degree or above, majored in Computer Science or related
? 5+ years experienced in HR/Payroll Industry
? 3+ years HR/Payroll project experiences. Experience for Ceridian( Asia + NA payroll vendor), SD Worx ( global leave and attendance system) and Success factor is plus 
? Good English language skill and can communicate with different country client in AP
? Professional manner and presentation and ability to set, manage and satisfy client's expectations through personal involvement or delegation
? Ability to understand and work with different cultures professionally.
? Demonstrate concern for meeting and exceeding immediate and future needs of clients.
? Ability to priorities tasks and time management skills, ability to work across various projects
? Ability to use tools such as Microsoft Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Project and Visio to effectively update and maintain documentation/ training/ demonstrations

颁发机构:江阴海关。依据海关总署公告2022年第106号（关于公布《海关高级认证企业标准》的公告）文件摘录相关认定的标准

items.jobName: 人力资源经理/主管/专员-员工问询方向
items.industryType1Str: 通信/电信运营、增值服务
items.fullCompanyName: 中国电信国际有限公司
items.companyIndustryType1Str: 通信/电信运营、增值服务
items.jobDescribe:
职位描述：
1、负责熟练掌握公司各个维度的人事政策流程，对复杂人事场景的问题咨询能够精准定位核心问题，提供解决方案，保证各项人事运营流程的高效推进；
2、负责组织团队质检工作，识别员工咨询服务工作开展过程的中的“痛点”、“难点”、“模糊点”，组织常态化专项培训，提升团队交付能力；
3、负责团队运营监测指标的建立和迭代，依据运营指标进行深度的运营情况分析，产出运营分析报告，保证团队运营质量；
4、负责探索和创新跨团队配合模式，提高海量咨询服务数据的利用率，发挥一线咨询服务的运营观察价值，产出业务观察报告，跨团队协同推动运营流程、人事政策的持续优化，提升用户体验；
5、负责关注前沿技术，探索咨询服务平台功能迭代的新方向，提高机器人问答交互能力，提升用户问题自助解决率，提高工作效率，打造强大高效，运转灵活的咨询服务团队；
6、参与并协助推进人力运营其他流程的重点项目。
 
任职资格：
1、2年以上人力运营工作经验优先，HRSSC 0-1建设经历优先；
2、熟悉劳动法相关的法律法规，熟悉人力运营工作流程和运作方式，具备较强的风险识别意识；
3、有较强的数据敏感度和优化意识，具备数据处理与分析能力，用数据说话，关注用户体验和结果导向；
4、有较强的跨团队沟通合作能力，能够快速建立良好的跨团队合作关系；
5、有强大的学习能力和自驱意识，责任心强，投入度高，具备良好的职业素养和合作意识；
6、良好的英文书面能力（CET4及以上，可作为工作语言）。
其他信息

items.jobName: 资深人力资源专员（数据分析）(J14699)
items.companyName: 深圳迈瑞生物医疗电子
items.fullCompanyName: 深圳迈瑞生物医疗电子股份有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
工作职责:
1、负责人力资源系统数据维护，并能结合政策制度、业务模块规则，监控与更正数据问题，保证操作准确性。
2、梳理HR各类流程与数据集成应用，保证数据合规、规范与效率。
3、负责HR编制的部署、变更、实施，对接预算监控，落地HR资源与人效管理基础。
4、输出人力资源各类数据报表，通过统计软件实现数据收集清理、匹配与可视化呈现，保证口径统一。
5、分析重点业务域主题报告，结合业务理解与链接对内外部数据研究，提出优化及改善建议，推动指标库建立。
6、参与部门共享服务平台日常运作，处理员工人事服务咨询，落实问题解决。

任职资格:
1、统招本科及以上学历，理工科背景，数学统计、信息技术专业更佳； 
2、大型集团公司或高科技企业人力资源从业2年以上，或具有人力资源管理领域项目的数据分析经验；
3、SAP 、Tableau、BI或其他E-HR系统使用经验，擅长使用数据处理分析工具和技术，精通EXCEL软件；
4、具备结构化思维及良好的数据分析能力和解释能力，能够清晰地向非技术人员解释和呈现数据分析结果；
5、有良好的英语读、写能力，英语可作为工作语言者优先；
6、工作踏实认真，抗压承受能力强，严谨细致，富有责任心，擅于沟通与协调，有保密意识。

items.fullCompanyName: 汇丰保险经纪有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
Job ID: 0000K3F8
Description
Human Resources (HR)
Human Resources leads the implementation of the Group’s People strategy, facilitating talent management, succession planning and employee mobility while defining and overseeing frameworks that support employee performance management, reward, learning and development, resourcing and engagement. Ensuring talent practices support relevant stakeholders and reflect HSBC values, the function reviews the people implications of business plans while delivering policies, projects, processes and activities in support of business objectives.
We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team.
In this role, you will:
- Drives regional and local HR initiatives and the strategic people agenda for PINB, aligning to the strategic direction set by the Group/region and utilizing external best in class practices and benchmark standards in offering proactive, topical and bespoke HR solutions to businesses
- Diagnose the people priorities of the business plans which will enable the successful execution of the business strategy
- leveraging professional expertise and business acumen while work closely with CEO, influence discussions and outcomes
- Partner with CEO and EXCO members, facilitate to explore future strategy, the ways to make it happen, what should be considered along the way.
- Identify organization capability and culture to realize business strategy, as well as a proper operation module to support this strategy.
- Created a shared vision from top team to every staff, make it a understandable objective, must win battle, and key action plan, help everyone understand what is critical to success and translates into specific objectives and targets
- Uses human capital metrics to anticipate and identify local trends, risks and needs within the business and translates these into strategic and relevant HR deliverables, managing their deployment into the business
- Ensures the attraction, identification, development, and engagement of talents within assigned portfolio in order to build a robust and sustainable talent pipeline to meet business goals
- Engages different HR teams in entities under Pinnacle and HR COEs to deliver the people plan.
- Partner with business leaders and managers in Pinnacle to drive effective people plans and strategic workforce solutions that contribute to business profitability and competitiveness. 
- Engages Communications and Risk Management to support employee communication and related people risk management outcomes in Pinnacle.
- Partner with CEO shaping and aligning talent for the business and build robust succession plan for critical role
- Be talent champion, encourage CEO and its EXCO teams contribute to developing/ nurturing top talent/ diverse talent, build mindset while developing future workforce plan including future skills to meet business plan
- Creates an environment where people can perform at their best, challenge, speak up and promote employees to be their authentic selves
Qualifications
To be successful in the role, you should meet the following requirements:
 
- Outstanding learning agility, seasoned leadership, extensive HR experience and proven track record in a fast-moving, complex and demanding corporate environment
- Strong capability of biz incumbent, partner with CEO via coaching, implementing transformation and change programmes
- Comprehensive knowledge and experience in relevant industry with a focus and interest in the Insurance, brokerage, and wealth management business, with demonstrated ability to apply insights and analytics into solutions implementation
- Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to manage senior stakeholder’s relationships
- Proven ability to manage change initiatives and HR projects across multiple business units
- Fluent in Chinese writing and oral.
- A Bachelor’s degree ideally with a post graduate qualification in an HR related discipline
You’ll achieve more when you join HSBC.
HSBC is committed to building a culture where all employees are valued, respected and opinions count. We take pride in providing a workplace that fosters continuous professional development, flexible working and opportunities to grow within and inclusive and diverse environment. Personal data held by the Company relating to employment applications will be used in accordance with our Privacy Statement, which is available on our website. /JL #LI-HSBCJHL
 
Issued by HSBC Insurance Brokerage Company Limited

items.fullCompanyName: 和元生物技术(上海)股份有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
工作职责:
职位信息
岗位职责：
1.负责企业内部人力资源系统的规划、设计、实施等工作。
2.挖掘并承接HR相关业务需求，结合系统现状与行业标准，输出有效可落地的HR数字化产品解决方案
3.协调内外部团队资源，推动产品研发、测试、实施、上线等工作。
4参与项目上线后的运营工作，持续收集用户反馈，并进行系统优化。
任职资格:
任职资格
1.本科及以上学历，3-5年人力资源系统实施、设计经验，熟悉HR专业知识和相关业务。
2.具备中大型人力系统项目实施落地经验，有项目经理经验尤佳。
3.具有较强沟通、协调和团队合作能力，可对项目推进进行有效把控，整合各方资源，达成目标落地。
4.有较强的逻辑思维能力，能够独立解决问题，敢于创新，自我驱动完成工作目标。
5.有项目上线过程中的数据治理经验。对数据敏感，善于进行数据分析。

sesameLabelList.labelDefinition: 该企业在中国证券交易所公开发行企业股票。
发布时间:2022-12-14,评定有效期:3年,颁发机构:全国高新技术企业认定管理工作领导小组办公室。符合《高新技术企业认定管理办法》规定，符合国家重点支持的高新技术领域，持续进行研究开发与技术成果转化，形成企业核心自主知识产权，并以此为基础开展经营活动，在中国境内（不包括港、澳、台地区）注册成立一年以上的居民企业。

sesameLabelList.labelName: 国家知识产权优势企业
sesameLabelList.labelDefinition: 发布时间:2023-11-29,评定有效期:3年,颁发机构:国家知识产权局。根据国知发管字〔2013〕36号文件为依据，国家知识产权优势企业拥有自主知识产权和知名品牌、国际竞争力较强，且知识产权管理体系相对完善、知识产权数量和质量大幅提升、知识产权保护能力明显增强、市场竞争力显著提高的企业。

items.fullCompanyName: 恒隆管理（上海）有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
We are currently seeking a highly skilled and experienced Assistant Manager with expertise in SAP SuccessFactors and SAP HCM to join our team. This role will be responsible for managing, maintaining, and optimizing our HRIS systems to support the organization's HR functions effectively.
Key Responsibilities:
-	Serve as the key stakeholder for all SAP SuccessFactors and SAP HCM-related technical support within the organization.
-	Provide advanced technical support to end-users, troubleshooting complex system issues, and resolving technical challenges related to SAP SuccessFactors and SAP HCM.
-	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support ERP systems development. Analyze, design, and implement enhancements and customizations to meet evolving business needs, with a focus on technical aspects.
-	Manage the day-to-day operation and maintenance of the HR information systems, including system updates, data management, security administration, and user support.
-	Conduct regular audits to ensure data integrity, system accuracy, and compliance with relevant policies and regulations.
-	Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies related to HR. Proactively recommend process improvements and system enhancements.
-	Collaborate with the HR team to develop HR analytics and reporting capabilities, leveraging the data available in SAP SuccessFactors and SAP HCM.
-	Ensure compliance with data privacy and security regulations and implement appropriate measures to safeguard sensitive HR information.

Requirements:
-	Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Data Analytic, Human Resources or related field. Relevant certifications in SAP SuccessFactors and SAP HCM are highly desirable.
-	Proven experience (5-7 years) working with SAP SuccessFactors and SAP HCM, including implementation, configuration, and ongoing system management, with a strong focus on technical support.
-	Strong technical knowledge of SAP SuccessFactors modules such as Employee Central, Performance & Goals, Compensation, Recruitment, Learning, and Succession Planning.
-	In-depth understanding of SAP HCM modules, including Organizational Management, Personnel Administration, and Payroll, with a strong technical background.
-	Solid understanding of integration concepts and experience integrating SAP SuccessFactors and SAP HCM with other HR systems or third-party applications, with a focus on technical aspects.
-	Exceptional problem-solving skills with the ability to analyze complex technical issues, identify root causes, and propose effective solutions.
-	Strong project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple priorities and deliver projects within established timelines.
-	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, stakeholders, and external vendors.
-	High level of attention to detail and commitment to data accuracy and quality.
-	Demonstrated ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information with professionalism and integrity.
If you have a passion for HR technology, a track record of providing advanced technical support for SAP SuccessFactors and SAP HCM, and a strong understanding of HR processes, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Apply today and take the next step in your HRIS career by joining our dynamic team as an Assistant Manager HRIS
